record.description: "This large group is the 1913 graduating class of University High School in Scammon Gardens near Belfield Hall. Albert Pick Jr. is the one with his hands cupped around his face. He was probably trying to say something while I [Alan D. Whitney] was taking the picture. Also in the print is Jim Becker of A. G. Becker & Co., Bob Byfield, and Frederick Kuh, the famous correspondent. Kuh is third from the left end, sitting in the second or third row, his head showing in full and his shoulders making a V between the two boys in front of him."
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: From an enclosed letter by Alan D. Whitney, dated Feb 21, 1954 to Robert Rosenthal, Curator University Archives.
